General.Name: Guangzhou Jet Bio-Filtration Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou Jet Bio-Filtration Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells laboratory consumable products. Its products include bioprocess, cell culture, liquid handling and storage, filtration products, molecular biology, cellsafe, medical consumables, biological reagents, laboratory equipment, petri dishes, ELISA plates, immuno micro plates, inoculating loops and needles, cuvettes, latex powder-free gloves, NBR gloves, and other products. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

1.Name: Changxi  Chen
1.Title: Director & Financial Controller and Financial Controller
